info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 2:51PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Luzerne County through 330 PM EST... At 249 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near East Berwick, or just west of Shickshinny, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazleton, Berwick, Nanticoke, West Hazleton, Freeland, Bear Creek, Dorrance, Conyngham, Nescopeck and Slocum. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 145 and 159. Interstate 476 near 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
